name: Disconnection Bridge
description:
Something about unstable connections and packet loss?

I'm not sure myself. I'm not computer networker.

Make sure you play on Wi-Fi for the authentic packet loss experience.

Press the left side of your keyboard to move the cursor left.

Press the right side of your keyboard to move the cursor right.

Press spacebar to place a block on the cursor. This has a short cooldown.

Make sure you don't drop any lemmings packets.

I rushed this out because Melty Blood: Type Lumina came out this weekend and I really wanted to play that game instead of making this one. I am sorry.
